Key Match Events: The Rays marked last year's Roberto Clemente Day in a historic, albeit unplanned, way by becoming the first team to start a lineup of hitters all from Latin American countries.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Kevin Cash said, 'That was actually really cool, and what an honor to be able to be a part of that.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rays outfielders Randy Arozarena, Manuel Margot, and Josh Lowe reacted after Friday's 7-1 victory over the Orioles in Baltimore, with Arozarena wearing No. 21 in honor of Roberto Clemente.
